section.title: Release notes
section.paragraph: The release notes for a patch should be included in the patch.
If the following applies to the patch, a release note is required:

list_item.paragraph: The deployer needs to take an action when upgrading
A new config option is added that the deployer should consider changing from the default
A configuration option is deprecated or removed
A new feature or driver is implemented
A long-standing or important bug is fixed

section.paragraph: Cinder uses reno to generate release notes. Please read the docs for details. In summary, use
Then edit the sample file that was created and push it with your change.
section.literal_block:
$ git commit # Commit the change because reno scans git log.
$ tox -e releasenotes
section.paragraph: Then look at the generated release notes files in releasenotes/build/html in your favorite browser.
